text.text: I started developing websites in 1995. Since then I've worked with various technology stacks like Perl-CGI, ColdFusion, PHP, Java/J2EE and most recently with core Javascript and NodeJS.
text.name: leftBody

text.text: After college, I worked as a graphic designer for a USAID project where I produced training and promotional materials for print. It was also there where I got to build my first company website on HTML 2.0. To this day, I still get excited when technology and visual communication come together to elicit positive user experiences and empower the user.
text.name: centerBody
